_header: Go forth king rule thee by sapience
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1988)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse Printed 1476-1558. London: Mansell, 1988, TP 469.3; headed by six Latin lines on the Twelve Abuses of the Age (‘Rex sine sapiencia…’).
Subjects: virtues; estates literature; advice, to princes
_description: John Lydgate, Instructions to the Estates: Follow the Virtues — two stanzas rhyme royal
